name: Spacen: The Beginning
description:
Developed by ECHTNICE Studio comes the single player space shooter SPACEN. Fight your way through endless waves of enemies in bullet-hell style and defeat powerful bosses. Between missions, you explore Space One Station in Third Person View. Here you can exchange collected scrap parts of your opponents for weapon upgrades and thus improve the fighting power of your spaceship. By interacting with NPCs, you will learn about the history of the resistance. The SPACEN universe is waiting for you!

STORY:
The earth was destroyed by people of the SPACEN dimension. Only the astronauts of the International Space Station survived and founded the resistance. The resistance followed the path of the destroyers into the SPACEN dimension in which they set up the SPACE ONE station and from which they start their missions against the destroyers of the earth. As Gary Rogers, you are fighting alongside resistance to Earth's destroyers.

FEATURES:
  • A classical Space Shooter with different perspectives
  • 3D low poly graphics
  • Upgradeable ship weapons
  • Powerful end bosses
  • RPG elements between missions
  • Explore the space ONE station
  • Sidequests
  • Difficulty system
